document_data.name: Esbre Felmorel
document_data.mainbody: '''Esbre Felmorel''' was the lord of Castle [[Felmorel]] in the mid–8{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Lord Felmorel was jovial, but vigilant.
document_data.Relationships: He was married to Lady [[Nasmaerae Felmorel]], and was friends with the explorer and warrior [[Barundryn Harbright]]. He was a little less enthused about his other acquaintance, [[Thessamel Arunder]]. His castle employed a number of [[wizard]]s, probably for combat, and more than a dozen warriors as guards.
document_data.Activities: Esbre Felmorel habitually hosted banquets in his castle.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: His feasts had a good reputation, and those who spoke of him in fear preferred to use his moniker of "the Mantimera".{{cite book/Elminster Ascending/The Temptation of Elminster|549|3}}
